C

D

displayBoard(char[][]) - Method in class Connect4TextConsole
This funtion prints the checker board.

This function displays the computers move.

This function displays a message indicating whose turn it is.

This function prints the first message of the game.
displayStart2(char) - Method in class Connect4TextConsole
This function displays the game mode selected.
displayWinner(int) - Method in class Connect4TextConsole
This function displays the winning message.
displayWrongMode() - Method in class Connect4TextConsole
This functions displays an error message if the player selects an invalid mode.

G

This function gets the game mode from the user.

H

height - Variable in class Connect4

I

This function displays an invalid move message.
isWin(int, int, char) - Method in class Connect4
This function determines the state of the game.

M

main(String[]) - Static method in class Connect4
Runs a two player text console Connect4 game with two modes.

P

This function places a checker on the checker board

R

V

This function determines if a move is valid.
